parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post contains a CMF number (11240015) at the end. This strongly suggests it is electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are mandatory for electoral campaign materials in Romania.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly lists candidates for both the Chamber of Deputies and the Senate from the USR party in Bistrița-Năsăud County.  This directly refers to specific candidates participating in the parliamentary elections.  Article 36 (7) - a applies.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, this content is clearly intended to reach a wide audience, not just a select few. The post is public and accessible to anyone on Facebook.  It addresses the wide population.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to promote the USR candidates in Bistrița-Năsăud County for the upcoming parliamentary elections.  Listing candidates' names and encouraging people to vote (implicitly through the "Vote counts" hashtag) is a clear attempt to influence the electoral outcome. Article 36 (7) - c applies.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. It lacks objective reporting, analysis, or diverse perspectives. Instead, it focuses solely on promoting specific candidates, which is not the function of journalism.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a structured presentation of candidates, clearly aiming to garner votes for them. The statement "Credem cu tărie că o Românie pentru toți este posibilă, și nu doar pentru unii!" is a general political statement, but it's used to support the candidacy of the listed individuals.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>2299342510466202</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to specific candidates (Article 36 (7) - a), is used during the electoral campaign period (implied by the context and the presence of a CMF number), has a clear electoral objective (Article 36 (7) - c), and is disseminated to a wide audience via a paid Facebook advertisement.  The presence of the CMF number further strengthens the case.  The argument that it's simply informing voters about candidates is weak, given the clear promotional intent. The spend of RON300-RON399 indicates a significant investment in influencing voters. The reach of 35K-40K impressions further supports the conclusion that this is a deliberate attempt to influence the election.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Lorand Toth</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Rus Marinel</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Orban Alexandra</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Cicai Andreea</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Rus Gheorghe</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Sângeorzan Nadia</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Bidian Paul</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Sângeorzan Artene</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Mureșan Liana</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Popescu Dumitru</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Dumitriu-Mureșan Dragoș</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>USR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
USR Bistrița-Năsăud, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 2299342510466202), cu un buget de RON 300-399, care promovează explicit candidații USR pentru alegerile parlamentare din Bistrița-Năsăud, inclusiv prin menționarea numelor lor (Lorand Toth, Rus Marinel, Orban Alexandra, Cicai Andreea, Rus Gheorghe, Sângeorzan Nadia, Bidian Paul, Sângeorzan Artene, Mureșan Liana, Popescu Dumitru, Dumitriu-Mureșan Dragoș) și prezența unui cod CMF (11240015), având un efect electoral clar prin promovarea acestor candidați și influențarea votului, atingând 35K-40K impresii.  Postarea, deși pretinde a fi informativă, are ca scop principal influențarea votului în favoarea candidaților USR, reprezentând astfel propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie. Contact: stan_calyn@yahoo.com, +40741641443, https://www.facebook.com/bistritanasaudusr/.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
